title: Any ideas how to fix my lag
body: Hello everyone, I have been league of legends for 3 months now and really enjoy the game. Although for the past couple of days  I've been lagging hard such as getting 200 ms farming  to 500 ms in fights before this I was getting 60 to 70 ms only. So I was wondering if anyone knows what I kind do/what do you do, to help lower my ms. I do  not believe its my internet since everything else runs smoothly as before, its only just when I get into the game. Thank you

replies.body: While your internet is still running smoothly there's still a pretty good chance that your network is having a hard time getting connected to our servers. Let's do a quick checkup on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to first make sure everything is still configured in the best way.
